subject: Complicated Junit Test
msgSnippet: Hi, Okay!! I am responsible to test an application that periodically sends a microsoft document thing to my mailbox. I can specify what email address i can
messageBody:
Hi,
Okay!! I am responsible to test an application that periodically
sends a microsoft document thing to my mailbox. I can specify what
email address i can send my microsoft document to. I was wondering
if there is a way in Junit that I can actually make sure that there
is a document in my mailbox. Is the testing for such kind of
application possible with Junit? Is there a better suited tool for
testing such kind of application? Any help on this matter would
appreciated. Thanks! ..
Abhishek
